page.title: 10ST.PETER'S CHURCH
page.content: St. Peter's church is a twin church with St.Mary's church Winkfield.St. Peter's church was built in 1850.The vicar is Reverend Simon Baynes he is also the vicar of St. Mary's. Reverend Andrew Rowe is the Chaplain of Heathfield boarding school for girls. He sometimes takes the service. St. Peter's church runs a choir,Sunday School,Teenage group,a Bible study group and a Stewardship commitee.The church hall is used by the Cubs,Scouts,Ballet group and Sunday School. In 1985 the church is raising money for the restoration of the church hall. Among the many graves around St. Peter's church is the grave of Billy Smart.
